name: aster (itch) (sez, anita v)
description:
Aster is a dialogue-driven narrative game that explores the famous Aster Festival held at one of the first marketplaces on the new planet Earth. You play as Cielle, and along with their robot companion Cosmo, come visit from a neighbouring planet to learn more about how Earth, documented centuries ago, has changed. Discover a bountiful market of culture and intrigue, as you dive into the history of the land and its people, and learn what happened to the Earth all those years ago.

Created by SLAMS:

  • Sara Hamilton (Lead Roles: Producer, Narrative Design, Concept Art)
  • Liam Stanley (Lead Roles: Music/Sound Design, Version Control & QA)
  • Anita Vassiliadis: (Lead Roles: 3D Modelling, Texturing)
  • Miguel Olivares: (Lead Roles: Programming,  Narrative Design)
  • Soraya Knight: (Lead Roles: 3D Animation, UV Unwrapping)

Controls

  • WASD to look around
  • Right mouse button to click
  • Spacebar to continue dialogue
  • E to interact
  • Escape to pause

We hope you enjoy playing Aster!
